query:
ALTER TABLE `contractAttachments` 
ADD COLUMN `propertyId` varchar(50) NOT NULL AFTER `contractId`,
ADD COLUMN `docType` enum('Contract','Notice','Deed','Assignment','Other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Other' AFTER `fileSize`,
ADD COLUMN `uploadedBy` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'System' AFTER `docType`;
